result.name: Intro to data science
result.description:
To introduce students to the problems arising from databases, including concurrency in databases, information security considerations and how they are solved-the problems arising from the integration of heterogeneous sources of information and the use of semi-structured data;\n' +
            '- non-relational databases and the economic factors involved in their selection;\n' +
            '- techniques for analysing large amounts of data, the security issues and commercial factors involved with them.
